item.title: Warframe Codes (May 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Warframe Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Warframe
  • Warframe Tips and Tricks
  • The Best Shooting Games Like Warframe
  • About the Warframe Developers

Warframe is a free-to-play sci-fi action game. It actually feels like the developers worked really hard on the game, as they have thought of many features, including customization items. Below are plenty of Warframe codes for freebies as Glyphs skins and others.

Updated May 25, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There’s a set of fresh rewards available in Warframe that you can claim to personalize your experience and show off some style. These options offer fun customization and add a unique touch to your loadout. Keep an eye out for updates, as more opportunities like this often appear. Check back regularly to make sure you don’t miss any future rewards.

Warframe Codes

Below, fans will find all the codes for Warframe, including a lot of Glyph codes. In the game, Glyphs are special images that players can use to personalize their profile or to distribute in the game. Glyphs can be placed on certain surfaces in the game, such as the walls of a player's base, or used as a profile picture.

Codes Checked on May 25, 2025.

How to Redeem Codes in Warframe

The process of redeeming codes is not as easy as one would expect since it is different from most other games. Therefore, if players have any difficulties, the step-by-step instructions below will help them:

  • First, visit the official promo code page on the Warframe website.
  • Then, players need to log in to their Warframe account.
  • Afterward, they should enter or copy the above-mentioned code in the Promo Code field.
  • To redeem the code, click the Submit Code button.

Warframe Tips and Tricks

  • Platinum Strategy: Invest the initial 50 platinum wisely, focusing on weapon and Warframe slots for efficient gear management.
  • Mastery Rank: Increase Mastery Rank by leveling gear and completing Mastery Tests.
  • Star Chart Priority: Systematically conquer Star Chart missions before venturing into open-world areas for better rewards later on.
  • Trading Tactics: Engage in trading when a platinum discount is available, and rely on Warframe Market for fair transactions, avoiding trade chat as a beginner.
  • Nightwave Rewards: Participate in Nightwave challenges for valuable items and rank advancement.
  • Syndicate Support: Join syndicates for passive reputation gains and rewards.
  • Endo Management: Spend Endo wisely, choosing essential mods over others.
  • Premium Assistance: Consider premium boosts for faster progression, especially if time is limited.

The Best Shooting Games Like Warframe

Shooters have proven to be very diverse, from fantasy to classics like Counter-Strike , for example. For those looking to expand their gaming experience, this article will provide five enjoyable and addictive shooters like Warframe .

  • Paladins
  • Payday 2
  • Warface
  • Apex Legends
  • Overwatch 2

About the Warframe Developers

Warframe was created by the developers from Digital Extremes. This Canadian team has been making games since 1993 and has more than 200 workers. Here are some of their titles:

  • Unreal Tournament
  • Epic Pinball
  • Dark Sector
  • The Darkness II
  • Soulframe

item.title: Invincible: Guarding The Globe Codes (May 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Invincible: Guarding The Globe Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Invincible: Guarding The Globe
  • How to Get More Invincible: Guarding The Globe Codes

Invincible: Guarding The Globe is an idle squad RPG from Ubisoft with a superhero concept and an emphasis on epic battles with powerful enemies. Here you will need to summon different superheroes to create a team and strategically destroy enemies that threaten humanity.

To get a good accelerator for your progress, you can redeem Invincible: Guarding The Globe , each of which contains worthwhile rewards. Don't miss the opportunity to get Hero Dossiers, GDA Gems, Molecular Enhancements, and other useful rewards, and hurry up because the codes have a specific expiration date.

Updated May 25, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are several active Invincible: Guarding The Globe codes available, each offering in-game rewards you won’t want to miss. These bonuses can help you make progress and unlock useful items as you play. Make sure to redeem them soon, as they may not stay active forever. We’ll keep updating this guide with any new codes, so be sure to check back for fresh rewards.

All Invincible: Guarding The Globe Codes

Working Invincible: Guarding The Globe Codes

  • NOTES4 - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards. (NEW)
  • BBEAST - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • WYATT3 - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • NOLIEN - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • INVPOD - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • AALIEN - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • OMNIKD - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.

Expired Invincible: Guarding The Globe Codes

  • OMNIIG - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • ADELYT - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • SHVDYT - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • FRANCS - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • CHARTS - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • FINAL3 - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • BILLS3 - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • ITSTJ3 - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • RYANS3 - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • IGTG24 - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • S3HERO - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • OMNI24 - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • CLOVER - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.

How to Redeem Codes for Invincible: Guarding The Globe

Redeeming Invincible: Guarding The Globe codes is quite a complicated process, especially if you have no experience with such things before in other mobile games. Here you won't be able to do it directly in the game, instead, you will need to redeem the codes on the official website, having previously generated a Verification Code. To save you a lot of time, here's how to do it:

  • Launch Invincible: Guarding The Globe .
  • Pay attention to the upper left corner of the screen. There will be an indicator of your level. Click on it.
  • This will open the Player Profile menu. Here, at the bottom of the menu, you will find the Verification Code option. Click the blue Generate button to generate the code.
  • After that, click on the Use Code button to go to the official code redemption site.
  • Here you will see two input fields. In the first one, you need to enter one of the working codes from the list above, and in the second one, you need to enter the Verification Code you generated earlier.

After filling in the fields, click on the blue Redeem button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification at the bottom of the screen that the rewards have been successfully redeemed and credited to your account.

How to Get More Invincible: Guarding The Globe Codes

To find more Invincible: Guarding The Globe codes, be sure to visit the game's official social media pages. This is where the developers publish them first, so if you are attentive enough to follow the updates, you can be the first to receive rewards in this free mobile game.

  • Official Invincible: Guarding The Globe Discord server.
  • Official Invincible: Guarding The Globe X account.
  • Official Invincible: Guarding The Globe Facebook page.
  • Official Invincible: Guarding The Globe Instagram account.

Invincible: Guarding The Globe is available on mobile devices.

item.title: Hunting Sniper Codes (May 2025)
item.description:
Hunting Sniper is one of the representatives of hunting simulator games. In it, players will have to compete in hunting various animals. But it is not enough to just hit the target, as you also have to hit vital points to earn more points and win. To do this, you will need to use various weapons, which can be obtained using Hunting Sniper codes.

These codes will reward you with various useful items, such as Gems. Moreover, some of them contain rare Chests from which new rifles drop.

Updated May 25, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are a couple of Hunting Sniper codes you can redeem right now for useful rewards. You can grab a Legendary Chest or pick up some extra Gems to boost your progress. These bonuses can make a difference, so it’s a good idea to claim them while they’re active. Keep an eye on this guide, as we’ll update it whenever new codes become available.

All Hunting Sniper Codes

Working Hunting Sniper Codes

  • deerhunter - Redeem this code to get a Legendary Chest
  • followcommunity - Redeem this code to get 300 Gems

Expired Hunting Sniper Codes

  • FAMILYHUNT
  • EASTERBANG
  • CRACKSOON
  • DREAMSHOT
  • WILDFRIEND
  • DOUBLETWELVE
  • WINTERHUNT
  • HUNTERSGIVING
  • perfectkill
  • Animalfriend
  • Happyanniversary
  • restandplay
  • Purrfectday
  • Funemoji

During the hunt in Hunting Sniper , players manually aim before each shot. But if, in the early stages, it is not difficult to hit the target, then the further you move along the leaderboard, the more difficult the challenges will be. And to win there, you will need to change the weapon to a more powerful one. To do this, players can open Chests or use Hunting Sniper codes.

Each of them will reward you with various free goodies, including the desired Chests of various rarities with new weapons. However, the codes are valid for a limited time, after which they expire and the rewards become unavailable. So, you should redeem them as soon as possible.

How to Redeem Hunting Sniper Codes

Using codes in Hunting Sniper is as easy as in other mobile simulators. Players just need to make a few taps:

  • First, launch Hunting Sniper .
  • After that, click on the button with three stripes in the upper right corner of the screen and go to Settings.
  • Then select the Game tab and tap on the Redemption Code button.
  • Next, enter the code and click Redeem to get your well-deserved goodies.

It is important to note that Hunting Sniper is case-sensitive, so you should be more careful when entering each code. For convenience, we recommend that you copy and paste them from our list.

How to Get More Hunting Sniper Codes

If you do not want to miss more Hunting Sniper codes, we recommend that you visit the developer's pages. Just like with most other free mobile games, there they post all the latest news about the game, including codes.

  • Hunting Sniper Facebook page
  • HuntingSniperGame X page
  • Official Hunting Sniper page

Hunting Sniper is available on mobile devices.

item.title: How FBC: Firebreak Could Foreshadow Control 2
item.description:
Summary

  • FBC: Firebreak shifts the focus from Jesse to the Firebreak, and could hint at major changes to the Oldest House.
  • Control 2 details could be teased through missions, including Jesse's involvement, and how the Hiss adapted.
  • There's potential for conflict with The Board, and even Alan Wake making a cameo.

In less than a month’s time, FBC: Firebreak will be taking players back inside the Oldest House, but this time, not in Jesse’s shoes. The script has been flipped since 2019’s Control , and this time, fans of Remedy’s mind-bending, Hiss-slaying action game will be in the more grounded shoes of mortals, known as the Firebreak. A lot has happened in this time: it has been years since the events of the first game, and the Hiss corruption has still not abated. As if that wasn’t enough, the Altered Items are also going walkabout, with the Sticky Notes a sticking theme in the pre-release trailers that the developer has put out. But all of these things could contain some important clues, not just about what to expect from FBC: Firebreak , but also what might be happening in Control 2 .

There are a couple of things known about Control 2 already. When Alan Wake 2: The Lake House expansion came out in 2024, fans were treated to a massive Easter Egg where they could meet Jesse’s brother, Dylan, setting foot in the Oldest House for the first time in five years. After a kaleidoscopic vision, it was pretty clear that things back at base were not ok, and probably wouldn’t be in the near future. This wasn’t the first time Remedy had dropped some information about Control 2 , however, as the studio released some concept art of an outdoor street, showing the House’s door wide open, and Hiss corrupted people floating nearby. Given how much Remedy loves to tease its projects, there could be more than a few details foreshadowing Control 2 .

FBC: Firebreak Will Likely Confirm Some Key Details of Control 2

Set approximately six years after the events of Control , FBC: Firebreak is probably going to confirm a lot of fan speculation, and hopefully, ignite some new theories. Control ’s world is a very intricately crafted one, and the first game left many Motel doors open to where the series could go next. The Oldest House’s lockdown is still not lifted, and Firebreak seems to hint that the House has changed quite a bit over the years. This could provide an important staging ground for Control 2 ’s Oldest House, hinting at how the House ever manages to open up again.

FBC: Firebreak Could Show What Control’s Major Characters Are Up To

Quite a few of Control ’s main cast have not come back into the spotlight since Control ’s AWE DLC. Jesse’s role in FBC: Firebreak is obviously a topic of major speculation. As the Director of the Bureau, she has a responsibility and the means to fight back against the Hiss, and her story in the first game centered around her coming to terms with this role. It seems highly likely that she will play some role, and fans might get to see just how well she has taken to the job, and if it has hardened her personality.

But Jesse isn’t the only one. Dylan in The Lake House seemed like he was still suffering plenty of mental trauma. His treatment by the Bureau probably means he will never be lucid, and Remedy could use that aspect to have him keep spinning cryptic hints about future events or fan theories. Arish, Emily, and Dr Underhill are also unknowns: they survived the first game, but living through the House’s siege must have taken a toll. As some of the more grounded staff, it could be them giving out jobs to the Firebreak, overseeing missions to clear out mold, for example. The elephant in the room is Dr Darling, who was last seen with Thomas Zane in Alan Wake 2 , so whatever he’s up to, it’s bound to cause a lot of problems, so hopefully, Remedy leaves a few Dr Darling videos scattered around.

It Could Hint at How the Hiss Survived Control’s Ending

Ostensibly, Jesse cleansed the Slide Projector, cutting the Hiss off from its source. Yet, six years later, the tide of Hiss doesn’t seem to be stopping. It’s known that Hiss corruption spreads through sound, and each new person corrupted can spread the sound further, so it’s possible that these resonant aliens don’t need a source to keep going, but it also seems possible that something bigger could be at work. FBC: Firebreak will probably let players fight that fire, but it doesn’t seem like they’ll be able to work out how the Hiss might have adapted until Control 2 .

The Board’s Involvement With the Bureau Is in Question

Jesse’s last meetings with The Board in the Foundation were not particularly positive, finding a new ally in one of the exiled members, Former. The Board’s relationship with the Oldest House was quite parasitic, and Jesse, always skeptical, outright disobeyed them when she felt confident. The Board is not going to take this lying down, or, in whatever orientation it finds itself in, and for the first time, could be meddling in the affairs of Jesse’s Bureau. This could manifest in some missions for the Firebreak, where The Board might make things difficult unless it is adequately appeased, which might hint at a potentially more antagonistic and detached role in Control 2 .

Whether The Board still features on the FBC badge might indicate its involvement.

FBC: Firebreak Could Deepen Remedy’s Connected Universe in Preparation for Control 2

Another person who happens to find themselves turning up in unexpected places is Alan Wake. Able to write himself into other people’s stories, Alan recently gained mastery of his destiny after Alan Wake 2 ’s Final Draft, banishing the Dark Presence from himself by trapping it in the spiral. Perhaps now, with more agency, Alan will be able to lend more of a hand, even if indirectly. A manuscript by Alan did implicate him in Trench’s corruption, although, given what is known about his inspiration from Alan Wake 2 , it is unlikely that Alan accidentally manipulated Trench into letting the Hiss in.

Instead, Alan Wake could well act as a guiding hand, setting up plot threads from his writer’s room that are seeded in FBC: Firebreak , but don’t bear fruit until Control 2 , or perhaps even Alan Wake 3 . The power of a good narrative can change reality in Remedy’s connected universe, and it would be pretty interesting to see Alan learning to use that power consciously, and for good, in the events of Firebreak , and hopefully, Alan and Jesse get to meet again.

Follow
Followed
FBC: Firebreak
FPS
Systems
Released
June 17, 2025
ESRB
T For Teen // Violence, Blood
Developer(s)
Remedy Entertainment
Publisher(s)
Remedy Entertainment
Engine
Northlight Engine
Multiplayer
Online Co-Op
Number of Players
1-3
PC Release Date
June 17, 2025

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

FBC: Firebreak is a cooperative first-person shooter set within a mysterious federal agency under assault by otherworldly forces. As a years-long siege on the agency’s headquarters reaches its boiling point, only Firebreak— the Bureau’s most versatile unit—has the gear and the guts to plunge into the building’s strangest crises, restore order, and blast their way back from the brink.

Paranatural Pandemonium
Dive into the Federal Bureau of Control’s (FBC) unpredictable and extradimensional headquarters during its darkest—and strangest—hours. As one of the FBC’s fearless first responders, you and your team are on call to confront everything from reality-warping anomalies to otherworldly monsters... no matter the odds. Will you contain the chaos or finally lose control?

Cooperative Chaos
Join forces with friends or strangers to tackle each mission as a well-oiled crew. Survival in this three-player cooperative FPS hinges on quick thinking and seamless teamwork as you scramble to tame raging paranatural crises across a variety of unexpected locations. Improve your odds by utilizing the tools and skills that make you unique or improvising with whatever’s on hand to support your crew.

Beyond Bullets
Before deploying, select your weapon and customize your Firebreaker’s Crisis Kit with specialized tools, grenades, support items, and paranatural augments... then modify them to suit your strategy and change the way you play. Experiment with different loadouts to perfect your playstyle and synergize with your team, giving you the edge to succeed in every mission, no matter the difficulty.

The Federal Bureau of Control
Return to the strange and unexpected world of Control or venture in for the first time in this standalone, multiplayer experience. Discover the iconic and unfathomable headquarters of the FBC — the Oldest House — from an entirely new perspective as a team of volunteer first responders with nothing but gear and guts to bring the Bureau back from the brink.

Powered by

item.title: Roblox: King Legacy Codes (May 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All King Legacy Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in King Legacy
  • King Legacy Tips and Tricks
  • Best Anime Roblox Games Like King Legacy
  • About the King Legacy Developers

The developers of King Legacy are constantly updating the game and providing many new codes. These codes have a significant impact on the experience, especially in the early stages of the game, as they offer a bunch of freebies, including gems, boosts, and cash. Roblox players can scroll down to see the complete list of King Legacy codes, as well as a guide to redeeming them, a list of other games like King Legacy , and information about the game's developers.

Updated May 25, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Below you will find several active codes that give you bonuses from x2 Exp and gems to stat resets and cash. Also, don't forget to redeem two new codes. You should redeem them while they are still available, because no one knows when they will be disabled. We're constantly updating this article, so be sure to check back here to make sure you don't miss out on any new rewards.

How to Redeem Codes in King Legacy

To redeem codes in Roblox: King Legacy , players must follow a few quick steps. To obtain some of the latest supplies from codes, they should input them correctly by copying and pasting the list provided. If a code doesn't work, they should double-check that the spelling is correct. If it still doesn't work, it has likely been redeemed or is no longer available.

  1. Launch King Legacy
  2. Click on the Settings button in the drop-down menu
  3. In the Settings window, click inside the Enter Code box and paste the code
  4. Click Enter to complete the process

King Legacy Tips and Tricks

To begin with, it is necessary to understand that players who want to achieve success must complete many quests. Players can find them in the city. A very important aspect of the game is the selection of enemies by level. Initially, it will be difficult for players to deal with enemies of a higher level, so choose carefully. Using additional skills such as Smash is also very important for victory.
